message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it for $1,100,000, which is a significant discount considering its potential value. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
